title: Renewal
description:
On Tom Peter’s site the Renewal 50. Selected favourites:
   Go to the nearest magazine shop. Now. Spend 20 minutes. Pick up 20-twenty!-magazines. None should be ones you normally read. Spend the better part of a day perusing them. Tear stuff out. Make notes. Create files. Goal: Stretch! Repeat… monthly… or at least bimonthly.
  Go to the Web. Now. Relax. Follow your bliss! Visit at least 15 sites you haven’t visited before.
